name: companies-house-corporate-dataset-column-stats
title: Companies House Corporate Dataset Column Stats
description: A column-based assessment of the data quality of the Corporate Dataset provided by Companies House created using Experian Pandora.

resources.name: Companies House Column Stats
resources.description: Data Quality overview of 53 columns from the Corporate Dataset (Open data from Companies House) giving basic information about the uniqueness, completeness, formats and other characteristics of the data. This data can be downloaded in CSV and the processes can be reproduced using the Free Experian Pandora Data Profiler.

resources.name: Companies House Outlier Stats
resources.description: A detailed overview of the apparent outliers in the Companies House Corporate Dataset looking at potential issues across 53 columns that could impact the utility of this Open data. Common errors are called out in areas such as Address, Postcode, Country & so on.

resources.name: Companies House PAF Address Match Overview
resources.description: A brief column based view of the match quality of addresses to the Royal Mail PAF file. Note that this is indicative only.
